frontmatter.title: Sentence Classification at Scale using GPT and BERT on Quarterly Corporate Call Transcripts over Past Ten Years
frontmatter.excerpt: Built a NLP classification model using a combination of fine-tuned GPT-3 Ada model and FinBERT to classify sentences into AI-related and not on millions data points.
